Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Dr. James E. Price, Ph.D.
Reviews.Content: This was a wonderful experience.  The Customer Service Department called me before the phone arriveed thanking me for doing business with them.  I was amazed and impressed by their courtesy.  They even included an unexpected accessory.  The phone works wonderfully - just what I wanted.  A high quality cost-effective cell phone for everyday usage.  They deliered me exactly what I wanted - and then added one of the finest examples of customer service I have ever experienced.

Reviews.Title: Rip-Off
Reviews.Author: Richard Laycock "RCL"
Reviews.Content: The photo shows all sorts of extra gear but what was shipped was just the phone, the charger and the battery, in the box. Well, I could live without the holster etc but I was a little annoyed.  Then I switched my wife's SIM card to this flip phone as she wished and tried to charge the phone. The "Travel" mini-charger they shipped didn't work at all. No amount of wiggling or shoving would get any juice to flow to the battery. Then the $5 cheap POS jammed in the female plug to the point I worried about the force required to remove it.It did come in the box but with no paperwork of any kind, a totally worthless packing slip that excluded 80% of the items shown in the SEVEN hi-res photos posted on the sale site. Four photos of the v551 with the NASCAR holster. Four large photos. Holster not included. This is a Classic Bait & Switch. Write these guys off. Everything they've got for sale is available elsewhere from more honest vendors.Thank God I only got my wife's $60 flip phone from AllStar. I got the $200 Blackberry, which AllStar had for $135, from a truly professional dealer in New York. Everything came in as shown and advertised, working perfectly right out of the box. If that's what you're looking for, a fair and trouble-free purchase, then please skip doing business with AllStar Electronics.

Reviews.Title: My Fave Phone!
Reviews.Author: The Conqueress "If I can't READ it, I'll WRIT...
Reviews.Content: I love this phone!  It does everything, and always has!  It arrived on time, as promised, enveloped in plenty of padding and secure packaging. No complaints whatsoever!

Reviews.Title: Second Purchase Of Same Item
Reviews.Author: R. A. MYERS "R A Myers"
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I've purchased this model phone from this vendor.  The second phone was in as good a condition as the first.  The confusion over the description was promptly and courteously resolved.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: watch lover
Reviews.Content: would love it if it were not so small. funcions very well did not try the photos but assume they were aequate

Reviews.Title: Motorola V551 Unlocked Gsm Flip Camera Cell Phone Unlocked for Any Gsm Sim...
Reviews.Author: old timer
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for the one I've had and liked. The only differance is that this one has the camera. The camera is not that great, but I don't need it any way. It's a good phone, and that's what I am after. I have no need for the "fancy" ones.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Stuart
Reviews.Content: Phone is durable and simple to use compared to newer models and came "on time" and "as advertised by vendor!

Reviews.Title: Size of the phone
Reviews.Author: Janet Marie Hart "movie watcher"
Reviews.Content: the phone has good volume,size is good,clear pictureThis flip-phone is the best one I've had, thank youjust great phone

Reviews.Title: Revie of Motorola V551 phone
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: This product did not work very well for me, but vendor I purchased it from was great.  He worked with me to be sure I was satisfied.
